metadata.description: Wes Cutter is a wanted man running from a violent past--the horrors of the Civil War, a brutal stint in a Union prison camp, and the savage fallout of Reconstruction. Now he's on a quest for the one thing in short supply: peace. Brian Azzarello (100 BULLETS) and Marcelo Frusin (HELLBLAZER) bring readers a Western for the modern age.
metadata.name: Loveless
